text: Srsti karechena utera madhye du'i prakara ebam garura madhye du'i prakara. Apani jijnesa karunah tini ki ubhaya nara harama karechena, na ubhaya madike, na ya ubhaya madira pete ache? Tomara ki upasthita chile, yakhana allaha e nirdesa diyechilena? Ata'eba se byakti apeksa besi atyacari ke, ye allaha samparke mithya dharana posana kare yate kare manusake bina pramane pathabhrasta karate pare? Niscaya allaha atyacari sampradayake pathapradarsana karena na.
